title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
en granted, Astarion interrupts and says he was hoping she'd kill him. Lae'zel says to him to cool his blood and he'll indulge him soon enough. Your interaction with Zorru ends.

An exclamation mark will then be seen on top of Lae'zel, interact with her to start a conversation. She'll start off by saying "The locals prove complaint. A useful trait.", then Shadowheart joins the conversation and says she warned you about keeping Lae'zel around, she's worried Lae'zel would cause real trouble soon.
